From: Yanshosh@...

::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "That sounds acceptable. I'll be sure to define what I want done exactly. Most of the time, however, as long as you don't lead everyone right back to base here, any amount of carnage is acceptable."

His comm recieves the message from the Infecticons, and he thinks for a few seconds.

"I have a mission for you, yes," he says, about to elaborate when the door opens and Wolfgang comes in. Zardus looks at the new bot, a bit of surprise showing for a split second in his optics before it dissapeared.

"Welcome back, Wolfgang. Wolfgang, this is Daemos, a mercenary. Daemos, this is my co-commander, Wolfgang," he says, introducing the two.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., WarBarge@h... wrote:
> :: Wolfgang ::
> 
> :: Wolfgang walks to the conference room, stumbling every couple of 
> steps.  He liked his new body, but it's balance wasn't the greatest 
> thing Wolfgang had ever seen.  Wolfgang arrives at the conference 
> room. ::
